abstract: Airlines are suspending direct flights to mainland China, and U.S. health officials are warning travelers to avoid all nonessential trips to the country, the center of the outbreak.
lead_paragraph: The death toll from a novel coronavirus has now reached 170 people, with most of the more than 7,700 cases reported in the central Chinese province of Hubei, the epicenter of the disease. At least 19 other countries have also reported cases, and the virus has been diagnosed in five people in the United States; all had recently returned from China.
